website_summaries.verdict: The Huawei P30 offers you a best-in-class camera setup and a terrific design while commanding a smaller price than the Samsung Galaxy S10, or even the S10E. It's a fantastic deal, but a hassle to buy thanks to geopolitics.
pros: Huawei's P30 is a gorgeous phone with an astonishing camera setup
Its battery life is exceptional and the phone sells for a reasonable price
cons: Power output by the Kirin 980 processor is good but not great, and the P30 lacks the premium feel of the P30 Pro
Huawei's EMUI take on Android remains a cut below pure Android, iOS and even Samsung's One UI

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone but not friendly for US user
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone a few days ago and in general it's a great phone. I took one star off because some features made me feel uncomfortable. 1st. it has limited capacity for US user. I cannot register Huawei ID because the US is not in the country list so I cannot access such as Huawei AppGallery and anything that require Huawei ID. 2nd, many Huawei apps state clearly on the privacy policy that Huawei will collect private information such as birthday. If I choose decline, then apps became not acceptable. I concerned pretty a lot on this because I have no idea how they will use my private information.
customer_reviews.author: Fangyuan Li

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using it for a few hours and I'm in love. The camera is a must for photo photographers
customer_reviews.author: britt

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone I have ever owned, much better than any iPhone. The camera is ridiculous.....it's alone worth the price. Also amazing battery life. The design is simple and clean. My only problem is the finger print reader is a LITTLE iffy, slow. Overall I am very pleased with this phone, I am glad I didn't get an iPhone instead!
customer_reviews.author: S. Nasar

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I have ever had!!
customer_reviews.text: I come frome a Samsung A5 2016 and the change is huge. This phone has a great camera, 128 GB of space and awesome battery that for my use can last for a day and a half. Don't think I need wireless charging since it charges in one hour and 6 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Diego S

customer_reviews.text: USA Gainesville, Florida Everything is perfect with phone. It's even better than expected. Love the compass with latitude and longitude. Impressed with the level to make sure objects are perfectly straight. Can take screenshots with knuckle tap feature. Split screen by sliding knuckle across display. Super charge. Had a charge off with Moto phone and this phone won. Crisp, clear photos. Emojis, GIF, stickers are so adorable. Carrier Metro PCS had phone active without having to research setup. This phone is better than I could wish for! Black is very shiny and professional look. Came with screen protector on phone, charger, and a clear case. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Nix

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone for 600. Got rid of my s9plus. Love it. Should be sold in the US not just on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: P S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera, best in this price
customer_reviews.text: Had this P30 for two weeks. Really love it with the battery life, face recognition and amazing camera. The picture at dark environment is unbelievable. The best phone I can get at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Tang

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly. Awesome camera, powerful cpu and a good amount of ram and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Da

customer_reviews.title: Great phone but pick it from a right seller.
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is great, love it! One tip for other buyers: don't order from TechnoMaster!!! The one I got (leftside) doesn't come with the original packaging, obviously it was opened and has been repackaged. I got another one for my friend (cuz it is such an amazing phone!) and it comes with original packaging, the seller even send her an adaptor for the fast charger. I have to spend extra money to get an adaptor. :(
customer_reviews.author: Gummy. M

customer_reviews.title: Superb Battery Life and Camera
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts well over a work day and evening with around 20%-30% after moderate to heavy use on an 8am to 11pm day. Camera's also great for selfies. I recommend the crystal version, looks awesome with a transparent case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cell phone & camera.
customer_reviews.text: Best phone and camera I have ever had so far. The phone does not do a few small things that I had been accustomed to with my old phones, but I am getting over it fast because of what this one does. Above all; I just wish it had a way to let me know I have a message via a blinking light or something. Other than that, it's the best one ever. The camera is just as good or better than ones that cost a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Krajchir

customer_reviews.title: SAMSUNG KILLER, BEST PHONE, BEST CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: This would be my second P30, my first one committed suicide and jumped off my motorcycle. I loved P30 so much I had to buy another one but this time with insurance.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: The fact that it is 6gb ram not 8gb ram.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and beautiful phone.. Ultrathin and fast! I guess the 8gb ram it said is a typo error.. It is in fact a 6gb ram but it is still cool fast and smooth. Also fast shipping and delivery too! Thanks a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Ronel M

customer_reviews.title: Nice nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Omg I really Love this pone, im a apple user. But with this phone goodbye iPhone!!! Nice battery, fast charge, really amazing camera, formal módel, all the phone is perfect, the telephone came with all the normal components: hedphones, case & fast charger
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Got it after price drop
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I got it for this cheap, what a bargain deal. Great phone, great response, and Amazing Camera.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Really great phone, shame for United States
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Camera great, battery great, screen quality great. Form factor great. Returned it only due to living in the United States and need a phone I don't need to wonder about functionality because of job.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bafford

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to finally have my p30 regardless of people saying that i shouldnt buy this phone in US and worst nightmare came true, at first i was very pleased to see that it came in the original package and everything looked perfect but just a few hours using the phone suddenly my screen when totally black for no reason even with a hard reset nothing happened, and since it doesnt have a us warranty Huawei can't fix it for you, thankfully im getting my refund and the seller replied to me but i really wanted this phone and now im scared to buy it again, be careful everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Best phone, unless you live outside China
customer_reviews.text: This phone was spectacular, loved everything about it. Until the geopolitics got involved I was satisfied. Unfortunately, I didn't want to have a phone my government and google didn't like. I also got a lot of spam calls when I switched to the phone, don't know if that was the phone or just a coincidence though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Incredible camera
customer_reviews.text: Loving everything about this phone. Btw, if you take a photo under night mode in a dark room, you'll be amazed.
customer_reviews.author: LALALA

customer_reviews.title: Huawei makes fantastic phones.
customer_reviews.text: Huawei p30 overall beats other brand phones. Half price, double functions, triple qualities. there is no reason don't use it!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: This is my first and last purchase with Huawei
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get clear calls inside my office. I use my wife's phone a Samsung a J2 and it works great! I cannot register my phone in the USA because my version is International. I tried several times and unfortunately got negative response because it is accepted in must countries except the USA. The only good thing about the phone is the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan G Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Best Android phone on the market!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Android phones you can get, Huawei has a beautiful camera and would honestly recommend this P30 over the P30 pro. Both are great but this has a headphone jack and playstore for the US market. I also love the fact you can look up items just by looking at something via the camera or find out how many calories a food has, very awesome!! Night shots are phenomenal and the battery can last up to two days depending how you use the phone and not to mention the very quick charge this has!! Definitely will be looking forward the P40 when released in the future. Such an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Tenshi Senpai

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Never going back to Samsung.
customer_reviews.text: I took a risk in ordering this phone. I have always had Samsung Galaxy smart phones, but when it came time to upgrade, I wasn't willing to spend $1000+ on a phone. This phone is also an android and fuctions essentially the same as a Samsung. The camera is fantastic, it runs smoothly, and the battery lasts a couple days (and I use my phone a lot!). Highly recommend if you're looking for a high quality phone, for less $$!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: screen broken but no warrantty provided by Huawei
customer_reviews.text: the screen damaged itself (no any falls or water-soaked), suddenttly turn into black and had no response when i touch it. The seller ask me to ask Huawei for warrantty, and the Huawei said that P30 is not offically released by Huawei in USA, so no warrantty provided. This is my third Huawei phone in 4 years!!!! I love China, but will never like Huawei anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Experience
customer_reviews.text: There are several problems with this phone, 1. overheating; 2. the speaker does not work well when making phone call with android phones; and 3. the phone is only 6 gb, rather than 8 gb as the advertiser said. I have contact with the technicians many times, but the first two problem cannot be solved, thus I plan to require return and refund.
customer_reviews.author: Davidlee

customer_reviews.title: Best phone, highly recommended...
customer_reviews.text: What a nice phone, fast, great screen, long battery life, and the updates are very quick compare to some big names in phone. And the cameras, well, the best there is, no doubt in my mind. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LukeBB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, battery works great and takes amazing photos. I gave it a 4 out of 5 because, some apps i cant use because i live in USA, and its a Chinese phone.
customer_reviews.author: boon xiong

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, long battery life can survive 2days usage without charge.
customer_reviews.author: Alaw

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera. Pictures are fantastic. Battery life is better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best phone I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: It is a reasonable price (half the price of an iphone with similar configuration). Also, it is so considerate that it comes with all the accessories including screen protector and case. It can last two days without charging. And the camera is Leica. Dual SIM card slots allow me to carry only one phone for both work and family. But unfortunately, I could not buy the highest configuration version, because there is not such ones at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great phone with excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves the phone, especially the camera. Great battery and storage, you really can't go wrong for the price. A thousand dollar phone if you bought it from apple or Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Worthy to have
customer_reviews.text: Switch from iPhone6sp, battery is so good, never need to worry about be out of battery. Screen is very clear and sensitive to click. No doubt that the camera is way more better than iPhone, especially in dark room. Only one thing not perfect, speaker is not loud enough
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone!.. but the front camera got dust inside o_0
customer_reviews.text: I loved the phone but the only thing is that dust got inside the front lens of the camera (This should not happen to a cell phone) I spend most of my day indoors and did not expose the phone to dusty environments. Dust started to accumulate slowly as well as steam. If you are considering to get this phone, I encourage you to use a water/shockproof case so no steam or dust get in the phone. Other than that, I loved the device and it's speed.
customer_reviews.author: mercho

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, even in U.S.
customer_reviews.text: I heard good words from friends about this phone. I know that it has excellent camera, battery life, and responsiveness. The only concern I had was whether it supports Google apps. With a little hesitation, I bought this phone. To my happy surprise, this phone has everything I wanted, even with Google apps. I am very happy for this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Haiyan Liu

customer_reviews.title: Works Overseas
customer_reviews.text: Reviewing to add that it's brand new and does work overseas (Costa Rica in my case). No issues whatsoever when I plugged in a local SIM card. Photographed with a "Spigen Rugged Armor Designed for Huawei P30 Case (2019) - Matte Black" which was also bought here. Battery life is the bomb! I could go out for an entire day without having to bring a power bank.
customer_reviews.author: IG: @simulationelson

customer_reviews.title: The best phone I ever had.
customer_reviews.text: The Camera on P30 is the best. especially the night vision is out standing.
customer_reviews.author: allan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: It's way better than iPhone and Samsung for cheaper price and better technology. 2 sim cards, nice cameras
customer_reviews.author: Mofareh Ghazwani

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for about 3 months. The battery life hasn't dipped much. With regular use the battery can last for 2 days. But with power intensive apps like gaming, it will last for a day. With fast charging you can go from 0% to 100% in less than 45 minutes. Phone feels great in your hand and is beautiful too. Phone response is lightening fast. The Camera for photos and videos are amazing! You get an Ultra Wide angle lens and and telephoto lens. 3 lens on the back in total and to front camera takes amazing selfies.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Flagship quality, mid range price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, well with the money. It is fast and lasts all day even with heavy use, such as gaming and watching videos.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Black screen.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great phone I’m sure, but shopped to me it wasn’t even in a “Huawei” box and within two weeks the screen won’t work anymore. I loved the phone while I had it. So I guess don’t buy it here is all.
customer_reviews.author: Richardson

customer_reviews.title: great phone and good battery
customer_reviews.text: After using this phone for several months, I dare to say this is the best mobile phone that I have ever used. Great camera, smooth speed, suitable size, and easy to use. The most impressive thing is that the battery can last at least one day for heavy user.
customer_reviews.author: Chengchi

customer_reviews.title: The camera and the battery life on this phone doesn't dissapoint
customer_reviews.text: The face unlock would sometimes fail to authenticate, but only under darker conditions
customer_reviews.author: Sifundo Xaba

customer_reviews.title: Don't think twice!
customer_reviews.text: I always loved this brand and the P30 didn't disappointed me, I can take pretty pictures during the day and the night, in really dark places where my friends with the newest IPhone can't. It charges really fast and anything I do the cellphone answers really fast. I won't give 5 stars because it had a problem with overheated.
customer_reviews.author: Severus

customer_reviews.title: thanks
customer_reviews.text: I have returned my Huawei P30. I have nothing I don't like about the phone, everything work great. I felt sad that I returned mine because the ban on Huawei phone in US. I already got my money back from the seller, Thank you. I would have buy Hwuawe again in the future . I still think it is better than the Samsung 10 I got now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beats iPhone on every point
customer_reviews.text: Happily switched from iOS. All the good points people said about this phone is true. Best decision I've made ever.
customer_reviews.author: SF Butler

customer_reviews.title: great phone better than galaxy
customer_reviews.text: the security features could use some work i am constantly having problems with the finger scanner, the face recognition is okay it works probably 75% of the time, all that aside i honestly love this phone for the price you are getting a phone that is better and sturdier than a galaxy or other android. I accidentally dropped it down my stairs ithit the wall twice and then landed facedown on tile and it didn't break it comes with a screen protector (already installed) and case as well. a great product minus the aforementioned issues
customer_reviews.author: haleyebergeron

customer_reviews.title: Great, but expensive.
customer_reviews.text: LOVED this phone. Love the interface. Gorgeous and easy to use. Wishing it was cheaper though, honestly. Had to return it because I couldn't afford it, but I miss it. Would get buy one for my entire family if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Hidaya

customer_reviews.title: So Far so Good
customer_reviews.text: Breathing Crystal really is that good with the clear case. SO FAR SO GOOD
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate

customer_reviews.title: very elegant looking device
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with this device and the camera quality. awesome device and for what I paid for it even a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and amazing camera function. The phone system was super fast at the beginning, but getting super slow like the other android phone.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Kurzawa

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional phone. Probably will last 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Good phone. Nice design. Good camera. Good reception and other features. Supports next generation Bluetooth. 4G phone is excellent. Only hiccup is fingerprint sensor that's on the bottom of the screen. It won't scan of orient your fingerprint off.
customer_reviews.author: ASA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera and impressive battery life
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is great. P30's camera is the best when it comes at night. Very good battery life and very fast charging. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dezhen S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful phone w/ fluent operation system
customer_reviews.text: I would like to recommand this phone to my friends. It is really good in quality and very beautiful. However, there still has a bug: the charger seems not to be designed for the common customers
customer_reviews.author: Sweet_tiny_xia

customer_reviews.title: Phone has fake factory seal
customer_reviews.text: I have not opened the box since it did not have the real factory seal. The phone is good since I tried it somewhere else, but be aware of unhonest practices by sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Badr Goubi

customer_reviews.title: Very good customer service
customer_reviews.text: initially having some issue with product, but after negotiating with seller, I got very satisfied solution.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: decent phone
customer_reviews.text: My phone broke so had to order another one. This phone arrived pretty quick. Huawei is pretty decent phone
customer_reviews.author: Mimi89

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new phone. Just got service on it with Tmobile. Works great! The photos are wonderful. I haven't even tapped into what all you can do with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: i love this phone as from recently switching from samsung, to try something new, the cameras (front and back) are amazing , best pictures so far, my only concern is the slight overheating and sometimes i find the battery life to die fast, but overall i would recommend this phone as it still has amazing qualities
customer_reviews.author: Gertrude Layne Mills

customer_reviews.title: finger print sensor issue
customer_reviews.text: Finger print sensor is not very sensitive and accurate. About 50% failure rate when I try to unlock my phone no matter how many times I re scanned my thumbs
customer_reviews.author: solopwang

customer_reviews.title: No SD card slot but still incredibly functional
customer_reviews.text: The phone is incredibly sleek and functions wonderfully. I am an international traveler and so the dual SIM functionality is incredibly useful. It's only slightly disappointing that it does not have a SD card slot
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Druce

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Built amazing. Pictures are superb. Thank you Huawei!!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best phone I've ever owned. Period. Love it. You won't be dissapointed. I'll be upgrading to a better huawei soon!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: You need this phone
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing phone. Price is right for all the awesome features you get compared to other "popular brands".
customer_reviews.author: B & A

customer_reviews.title: a smart choice
customer_reviews.text: this is my second time buying huawei p30 because it's an excellent phone that i've recommanded to everyone around me. The camera, capacity, functions and price are all better than 🍎 which i had been using for 6 yrs before i got my huawei.
customer_reviews.author: Shine Moon

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: It was a great phone BUT this huawei phone can not make any Google app work..... Return
customer_reviews.author: ou xi

customer_reviews.title: Loses a star for photo post processing.
customer_reviews.text: Would be a 5 star if not for the fact that the camera post processing sucks. Using other apps that provide native unedited camera access solves this to an extent (eg. Open Camera or patched google camera) but since they aren't customized for this camera they are a compromise on quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pranav Iyengar

customer_reviews.title: Nc
customer_reviews.text: Not sure since my order got messed up so it went back right away
customer_reviews.author: SamyPro

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Best android phone out for camera uses.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Fingerprint reader is testy. I had to use my pinky. But other than that. Best phone I have ever had. My only complaint is that it doesn't have the dual Sim set up my mate had.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Phone runs very smooth, I never met the problem of lags when I was trying to use camera or apps.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: An excellent camera phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for its cameras. Not disappointed, the cameras are amazing, far better than that of my previous Samsung phone. The WIFI is ultra sensitive. It picks up the signal while other phones couldn't detect. An excellent phone for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Ideal backup phone for a ten-year iPhone user
customer_reviews.text: Not recommend for ten-year iPhone user like me, but it is really a ideal backup cell phone for everyday usage. Yes, it shows potential of Huawei and can’t wait for its Mate X foldable phone.
customer_reviews.author: RCZMLLC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone at great price
customer_reviews.text: This is the fifth Huawei phones we have bought. The quality of these phones is excellent. We never experienced any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Best choice
customer_reviews.text: I love it , excellent quality. Battery last more than 24 h even with extreme use
customer_reviews.author: Bp

customer_reviews.title: Receives updates with latest Android security patch.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works well. Call quality is awesome. Phone operates smoothly. Camera is good and feature packed. Battery life is great, can last a full day with moderate to heavy usage. Speakers are okay. Lots of features and customizations. Overall great phone.
customer_reviews.author: COTK

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This phone is better than most of the phones out there, and it comes at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so excellent !
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this phone, so far its best buy this year. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome photos
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this phone specifically for the camera. The camera works brilliantly especially under low-light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: How to charge
customer_reviews.text: Its only my 2nd day with this phone but my boyfriend has it and loves it, my only problem with this is it only came with European charger.
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: i received it, this is the great thing during this period
customer_reviews.text: I thought i will lost it, due to all the issues that might happen. so happy that i received it and i like it
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Phone!
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say this is one of the best phones I've ever had, and I'm completely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy - screen is faulty
customer_reviews.text: The screen is messed up, and I only just noticed. There's a blue line in the middle of the screen that only shows when the background color is grey
customer_reviews.author: Agrimony

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, but I choose to return it after days of struggling because there's no Huawei repair center for this particular model P30 in the US.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Wang

customer_reviews.title: This phone can't be used in USA . Some applications doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: This phone can't be used in USA . Some applications doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: thomas araia

customer_reviews.title: It worth it
customer_reviews.text: My best phone ever. I love the camera it takes beautiful pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie107

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The phone is wonderfully amazing, the camera is excellent, very good supercharger, the battery is full in one hour and half. I 'm still discovering the wonders day by day.
customer_reviews.author: Moby Ndoumbè Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Value, great camera
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this phone. My only complaint is the fingerprint can be a little "touchy" tho face recognition works amazing!! Ver good value compared to Samsung
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Don't by this phone! It is definitely not like the HUAWEI I bought in China! The battery would need a long time to be charged and would run out of battery for only 1 afternoon! I doubt this thing I bought is a used one!
customer_reviews.author: Jun Hao

customer_reviews.title: What's going on!!!
customer_reviews.text: On June 9th it has stop working and will not charge therefore not turning on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cell phone with great lens. Very pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The product is pretty good, it is valuable, nice, perfect feature, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jna2432

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mobile Choice
customer_reviews.text: The Hauwei P30 is far better in superiority and workmanship. It has many functions and the quality is the best. The cameras provide excellent quality and its sturdy ability is 2nd to none.
customer_reviews.author: Carl R. Busby

customer_reviews.title: Wrong power supply with cheap adapter.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great, gave it 4 stars because I received the wrong power supply with a cheap adapter that falls from the wall if you move the cable. I'll update the review when I use it for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Luz M. Mendez Padin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: In love with this phone it's the best one I have ever had
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone with affordable price, decent battery life and amazing camera, though the system and inscreen fingerprint sensor can be better...

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice price~benefit
customer_reviews.text: The camera on this phone is just superb and the battery is one of the longest lasting I have seen
customer_reviews.author: Reynado Josue Mata Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone! Camera, build quality and battery life are top notch.. the only downside to this device is the software

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product discription
customer_reviews.text: In the product discription it was given the have is having 8gb ram but it 6gb only
customer_reviews.author: Sunandh

customer_reviews.title: Product works good. Looks new. Shipping took almost a week.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this phone, it came in perfects conditions and so far I would highly recommend it.
